radiographic_examinations.procedure_name: Thirst trial combined with desmopressin infusion
radiographic_examinations.findings: Unchanged urinary osmolalities between the start (235 mosmol/kg H2O) and end (229 mosmol/kg H2O) of the treatment.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Subsequent thirst-desmopressin trials revealed urinary osmolalities of 112 and 101 mosmol/kg H2O (trial 1) and 150 and 138 mosmol/kg H2O (trial 2) before and after treatment, respectively.
